title: Colchester 'triple murder': Man, 32, charged as police name men stabbed to death
text:

Police have charged a 32-year-old man in an alleged triple murder and named the three men stabbed to death in a "targeted" and "isolated' attack.

The victims were 35-year-old Danny Gibson, 31-year-old Jason Gibson and 35-year-old Richard Booth, all from Colchester, Essex.

All three died after being stabbed multiple times at the weekend, according to police.

Tom Saunders, also of Colchester, was arrested on Sunday and charged in the early hours of Tuesday with three counts of murder.

Essex Police said the suspect and victims were "well known" to each other and detectives do not believe the killings were linked to any gang-related crime or drug use.

(Image: Eastnews Press Agency)

The victims were found dead when officers were called to the scene.

Danny Gibson and Jason Gibson were found dead inside a home, while Mr Booth's body was discovered inside a car in a street nearby.

Saunders is due to appear at Colchester Magistrates’ Court on Tuesday.

Colchester district commander Chief Inspector Rob Huddleston said: "I want to thank residents for their understanding, patience and co-operation while we continue to investigate the circumstances surrounding these tragic deaths.

(Image: Eastnews Press Agency)

"This incident has left our community shocked and saddened.

"We are treating it as a targeted and isolated incident.

"Those involved were well known to each other and we do not believe it was linked to any gang-related crime or drug use.

"Colchester is a safe place to live, work and socialise and we will continue to work with our partners to ensure this continues.

"We are carrying out extra patrols in the area and if you have any concerns, please don't hesitate to speak to one of my officers."

A police spokesperson said: "A man has been charged with the murder of three men in Colchester.

"The bodies of two victims were found inside a property in Wellesley Road during the early hours of Sunday 6 October.

"We have identified the victims as 35-year-old Danny Gibson and 31-year-old Jason Gibson, both from Colchester.

(Image: Eastnews Press Agency)

"The body of a third man was found inside a car in Hospital Road. We have identified him as 35-year-old Richard Booth, also from Colchester.

"Post-mortem examinations took place yesterday, Monday 7 October, and found they died as a result of multiple stab wounds.

"A 32-year-old man from Colchester was arrested on Sunday in connection with their deaths.

"He was charged in the early hours of this morning, Tuesday 8 October, with three counts of murder.

"He is due to appear at Colchester Magistrates’ Court today.

"Detectives are continuing their investigation and a police cordon remains in place in Wellesley Road while specialist teams search ten areas that are being treated as crime scenes."
description: All three victims died after they were stabbed multiple times in Colchester, Essex, say police, who have charged a man with three counts of murder
